member.name: P:Visionscape.Display.Devices.DeviceDropdown.AutoConnect
member.summary: Gets/Sets the current AutoConnect State. If true, whenever the selected device changes, the VsCoordinator OnDeviceFocus event will fire. Other controls can look for this event and "Auto connect" to the selected device.
